text:
@jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Really Jeff? This is just sad. The arena was empty, teens humiliated the President on Tim Tok, 6 advance workers w/ coronavirus spent a week spreading it in Tulsa and the audience cheered because Trump managed to take a sip of water.

It couldn’t have gone worse & Trump knows it.
